meta.title: Privacy Policy - Aviniti
meta.description: Learn how Aviniti collects, uses, and protects your personal data. Our privacy policy outlines our commitment to your data security.

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.p1: Aviniti ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website aviniti.app, use our services, or interact with us in any way.
introduction.p2: By accessing or using our services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

personal.heading: 2.1 Personal Information
personal.description: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

items.contactForm: Fill out a contact form or request a quote
items.communication: Communicate with us via email or WhatsApp

personal.includes: This information may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, and project details.

automatic.heading: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
automatic.description: When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information including your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, pages viewed, and the dates and times of your visits. We use this information for analytics and to improve our services.

cookies.heading: 2.3 Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and understand where our visitors come from. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

howWeUse.heading: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect to:

items.respond: Respond to your inquiries and provide requested services
items.process: Process and manage project estimates and consultations
items.updates: Send you relevant updates about our services (with your consent)
items.improve: Improve our website, products, and services
items.protect: Protect against fraud and unauthorized access

informationSharing.heading: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

serviceProviders.label: Service Providers:
serviceProviders.text: With trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business (e.g., hosting, analytics, email services)

legal.label: Legal Requirements:
legal.text: When required by law, regulation, or legal process

businessTransfers.label: Business Transfers:
businessTransfers.text: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

consent.label: With Your Consent:
consent.text: When you have given us explicit permission

dataSecurity.heading: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.heading: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

yourRights.heading: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.label: Access:
access.text: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you

correction.label: Correction:
correction.text: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

deletion.label: Deletion:
deletion.text: Request deletion of your personal data

optOut.label: Opt-Out:
optOut.text: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time

portability.label: Portability:
portability.text: Request your data in a portable format

yourRights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at

thirdPartyLinks.heading: 8. Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our website may contain links to third-party websites, services, or applications. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

childrensPrivacy.heading: 9. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.description: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child, we will take steps to delete that information.

changes.heading: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contactUs.heading: 11. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
